name: Roberta Antunes
coverLetter:
Hello! My name is Roberta, I'm Brazilian, 35 years old. I have experience in trimmer. I worked on some farms in Eureeka, Garberville and Hambo - CA. I'm in love with the marijuana world and would love to work with you. My boyfriend's name is Christopher. He was born in Hawaii. He has great experience in farms and great ability as hands. He's shaper of surfers boards. We are a hard-working couple, optimistic and easy-going relationship with people. 
We can have all the supplies needed to do a great job.
No drama.  Cheers!
